original_title: Batman and Robin: An All-Male XXX Parody
overview: Batman & Robin is a hardcore parody. Join the dynamic duo in their very first all male adventure and find out if they can bring The Riddler and The Penguin to their knees in their very first all-male adventure. A fiendish bank robbery has wiped out the city's reserves. What diabolical criminal mastermind could be responsible? Watch as the plot - and cocks - thicken when the Riddler and The Penguin team up again. Holy hard dicks, Batman!
title: Batman and Robin: An All-Male XXX Parody
